title: YouTube Music for Wear OS finally receives streaming support and a new Tile
content:
The YouTube Music app for Wear OS has been missing quite a few important features since it debuted last year. But it’s finally getting better. Earlier this year, we learned that the app was set to get streaming support as well as a new Tile. Both features are now official and will soon be making

The post YouTube Music for Wear OS finally receives streaming support and a new Tile appeared first on XDA.
description: The YouTube Music Wear OS app is gaining the ability to stream music over LTE or WiFi and a Tile. Read on.
